BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Add a parameter to describe the lambda in a transformedMatch matcher (#122013)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Remove assertion about theoretical path separators The only real path separators are either forward or back slash. Trying to use something else like newline fails to even parse as a path on windows. This commit removes testing of other separators. closes #121872
